directions: Remove rind from watermelon and cut enough fruit into 1-inch pieces to measure 5 cups. Freeze watermelon in a sealable plastic bag at least 3 hours and up to 1 week.
In a 5- to 6-cup blender blend frozen watermelon with remaining ingredients until thick and smooth.
ingredients: 1/2 cup fresh lime juice (from about 4 limes)
title: Frozen Watermelon Margarita
